item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Luca and this is my blog, where I post about the things that interest me. I have a Master’s degree in Cellular and Molecular Biology, and I specialize in Bioinformatics. I am based in Turin, Italy. I’m currently collaborating on the GATTACA project at Prof. Munaron Lab, under the supervision of Dr. Ruffinatti at the University of Turin. I’m also looking for a PHD position in the Bioinformatics field.

item.title: Arch Installation
item.description: All the steps I use to install Arch
